text: Bertheau is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Charles Bertheau (1660–1732), French pastor *Ernst Bertheau (1812–1888), German orientalist and theologian *Julien Bertheau (1910–1995), French actor *Margarita Bertheau (1913–1975), Costa Rican painter and cultural promoter *Peter Bertheau, Swedish bridge player *Therese Bertheau (1861–1936), Norwegian mountaineer
title: Bertheau
